name: @arbiti/browser
description: Framework-agnostic library for running Arbiti on the browser

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && nr bundleServiceWorker && ARBITI_ENV=production node ../../scripts/setEnv.mjs dist/env.js
scripts.build:dev: rimraf dist && tsc && nr bundleServiceWorker && node ../../scripts/setEnv.mjs dist/env.js

author: Arbiti.com
